Property donation deed worth Rs.3,40,000/- dated 04th October, 2025
Written by: K., residing in house number 10-45, Kunukuntla village, Tadimarri mandal, Sri Sathya Sai district. Chandrappa's son K. Raju, age 27 years (Aadhar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) (Mobile No. 95021 02215) to:-
Donor: K. Chandrappa, son of K. Pedda Kullayappa, age 70 years (Aadhar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX) (Mobile No. 95021 02215), residing at house number 10-45, Kunukuntla village, Tadimarri mandal, Sri Sathya Sai district, the donation deed I have written is that you are my own. Since you are my only son, out of my deep love for you, I consider love as the only fruit and I have given you some property without any fruit, and I have given you the property as per the schedule below in my possession right experience, as a gift, free of charge, and I have taken possession of the property this day. Therefore, from now on, the property as per the schedule shown below belongs to you and you and your heirs should enjoy it with full rights, but neither I, my heirs nor my cousins can have any right or obligation. I have not previously given the property as per this schedule to others, alienated it, arranged for sale, etc. This is a written deed of donation given with my consent. Chandra

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement deed No. 7615 of 2025, dated 04/Oct/2025, executed by K. Chandrappa in favour of his son, K. Raju, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 95.55 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 10-45, comprised in survey number 385, L.P. No. 1096, situated in Kunukuntla Village and Grama Panchayath, Tadimarri Mandal, within the District of Anantapur registered at sub-registrar office Thadipatri is bounded as follows: North by: House of Gavi Reddy Madhusudhan Reddy South by: Road Rastha East by: Road Rastha West by: House of K. Ramachandra Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: The EC has been verified and downloaded using the document number parameter, as the option to retrieve EC records using the property address is currently unavailable in the Online EC portal, The F.I has to verify the same and proceed accordingly.
